title: How do I level up in the boards
body: How do you go about this? I can't make any posts. Someone help please

replies.body: You go to a campfire and tally up your EXP for the day.  Just kidding!  :P  Sometimes an account needs to sync to the boards when posting for the first time.  It looks like you've level'd up and showing as 30 now.  Let me know if you have any issues posting!
